title: 1999 Jeep Cherokee Sport 4x4

summary: ZJ in solid shape. Full leather interior, cold AC, no major rust. Recent transmission service. Clear title.

summary: 2.5-inch lift started, needs shocks and alignment. Engine runs strong. Good bones for a build. Sold as-is.

summary: Pulled from a 2000 XJ, ran great until the body rusted out. Compression checked, all six cylinders good.

summary: Pulled from a low-mileage XJ. Shifts through all gears cleanly. No slipping or codes.

summary: Complete 3.5-inch lift kit removed during upgrade. Springs, shocks, and hardware included. Confirm fitment for your year.

summary: 1997-2001 XJ front clip, straight panels. Minor paint fade. Good option for a rust repair or color change.

summary: Need a working NP231 from a 97-01 XJ. Will pay fair price for a unit that shifts into all ranges cleanly.

title: 2000 Cherokee Sport, 130k, Clean Title
summary: Daily driver for years, time to let it go. Runs well, cold AC, minor surface rust on frame. Maintenance records available.

title: 1994 Cherokee Country 4x4
summary: Older Country with the 4.0L and AW4. High miles but runs well. Some exterior wear. Good project or budget daily.

summary: Head gasket replaced at 175k by shop. Runs strong. Could use new tires and an alignment. Rust-free Florida truck.

title: 1998 Cherokee Classic, 4x4, 155k
summary: Classic trim with factory options. Clean interior, original paint in fair condition. Good daily with some minor work.
